favourite.article: Our hearts our only for You!
It is not a small thing to say "Lord Jesus I love You". As we love Him we set our being, our spirit, our soul and body on Him! Lord, gain my absoluteness.
We were singing out of tune, but all was so loving and warm. We love You Lord.
Oh Lord grant us mercy to see Your worth above everything else. Amen.
If you love the Lord, there is no waste of anything you have, we can pour all out everything to Him like Mary did.

I love you Dear Jesus with all of my heart. I praise Your holy name. I give You thanks and praise for each day that get to live. Thank You Jesus for dying on that cross for me. Thank You, thank You. You have kept me alive all these through my 3 times breast cancer bouts. And my stroke. I am still alive. Praise Your holy name. Thank You. Without You, I would not have made this far. I will trust and love You forever. Thank You Dear Jesus. I love You. I give You all the praise. Love, Your daughter.

I love You Lord with all my heart. I don't want to have my own opinions, I just want to continue loving You. You are the resurrection and life, this is the reality and truth without doubt, I love You and believe who You are and all You can.
Lord, we've seen Thy preciousness, Thy worth, Thy reality. Now, our Lord, we must confess our heart is only for Thee.
No reserves, no retreats, no regrets. - William (Bill) Borden
We can be the Mary's of today! PTL!
That I could pour my love on You Jesus, just as Mary did.
Lord, I count all other things loss. Lord, You have captured my heart. Lord, Iâ€™ve seen Thy preciousness, Thy worth, Thy reality. Lord, I must confess that my heart is ONLY FOR THEE!!!
Lord, I want let my entire being be occupied by Thee.
LORD JESUS CHRIST, I love YOU...
Like Mary Lord, I too would pour my love and all that I have.
She who has been forgiven much, loves much. Lord, I love You!

The story of Mary is that she loves the Lord Jesus to the uttermost by sacrificing her most precious treasure, all of her heart, and even all of her living and life. The story of Mary is revealing and proving of her response and expression from the story of Jesus.
The story of Jesus is that for God so loved the world, the worst evil men, that is you and me and Mary, that He gave His only begotten Son, that is Himself as Jesus, the very God-man, that every one who believes into Him would not perish, but would have eternal life, that is His life and nature not His Godhead.
Surely Mary believes that story of Jesus, and that makes her receive His eternal life, becoming her new life, her new story, her never ending love story with Him forever and ever.
What a marvelous story of love ever written! The story of mary and the story of Jesus!

Mary poured her alabaster flask for the Lord. By doing so, she gave her past, present, and future to Him. To many, her offering, as well as the thousands of precious lives, heart treasures, high positions, and golden futures, were "wasted" upon Him; however, these offerings were not a waste but a fragrant testimony of His sweetness. This hymn reminds to me that I must do the same. Lord Jesus, I give my whole being to You!

I love the Lord because He first loved me. Though I have failed Him, I am a trophy to His grace! She who is forgiven much, loves much, and He is everything to me. I read all the comments here and my heart rejoices in my brothers and sisters from all over the world. We are His bride! Come quickly Lord Jesus!

Lord Jesus I love You. As Mary poured out her love to You, Lord, I offer my best love to You, Lord, giving myself to You, Lord, my heart captured by Your beauty. Possess me Lord JESUS. Lord, I long for Your coming. Oh Lord Jesus, preserve my first love to You, Lord, that You may capture me more as I live on this earth.

O my soul, may my treasure be only Jesus. I come as a needy beggar, yet with boldness, to the Throne Room of Grace. Thank You, Jesus, that You ever live to make intercession on my behalf, You see each tear, You are touched with the feelings of my infirmities, Your love reaches the darkest corners and with You, nothing is impossible. Come, Maranatha.

There is really no one like our Lord Jesus in heaven nor on earth. I only desire Him and no one else! Because everything is vanity, dung, loss, and drains my love! He has captured our hearts. Thank the Lord that He has captured our hearts! Now I want to set my whole being absolutely on Him because I've seen His preciousness! "Now my Lord I must confess, my heart is only for Thee!"

This song is so touching because what really matters to us as believers in Christ is that we love Him and pour everything out for Him. His preciousness is worth it all! I appreciate this hymn very much because it constantly reminds me to come back to live in this divine romance with those who would be His Bride to bring Him back.
In Him, Ray
This music really touches me. When I listen to this song, I just realize that I just need to pour everything unto Jesus. It's such a wonderful feeling when I just trust Jesus with everything.

Though my heart and flesh failed Lord, but still You have shown us to be our portion, apart from You we cannot go on, but You are the grace that supplies us day by day. Deep in our spirit You are still the Lord Who has called us and even promised us to bring us into the real rest and satisfaction. Lord Jesus we love Your appearing, we long to see You face to face. Come Lord Jesus. Amen.
Lord, I love You. May I be like Mary, pouring out my love offering!

It really touches my spirit and soul every time I hear this song. It reminds me that I need to give everything for the Lord. I do really love to set my heart on Him. I do miss the church so much. May the Lord give us a vision of giving our best for Him.

No one can ever satisfies our soul but Him. Everything in this world are nothing compared to Him. He is worthy of our offering. I thank God for allowing me to go to the Full-time trianing in Malabon in spite of the world's offers and deception. My job can't hold me from loving the Lord. I felt that He needs and wants me to go full-time, and I'll give Him the preeminence in all things. Let's waste ourselves upon Him. Even our most costly and valuable spiritual treasures, wasting ourselves upon Him. I love You, Lord. Preserve me all the days of my life. I need Your grace and mercy that I could arrived at the maturity in life as a full grown man in You. Amen.
Amen for this wonderful song. My heart was captured and being refresh for a new consecration that giving myself to Him is absolutely not a waste.
wooowwww this song is so sweet. I love this song so much. Lord there's none in heav'n nor on earth that we desire but only You Lord Jesus. Amen.

now, my future is Him... it always reminds me at all.. and renew my consecration to Him whenever I heard this song. every thing that I have, even the most Precious thing in my life is just nothing if i could not give this to our Lord Jesus. now, it is my whole being and everything that i have is my love offering to Him... serving the Lord is my Future.. the world has nothing to do with me... because I am only for the Lord.

We sang this song several times at a conference and I got a new appreciation of this song. This song is so sweet! We all need to love the Lord with all that we have, like Mary did. "Like her, Lord, I too would pour my love and and all that I have"
IT HAS BEEN A LONG TIME AGO FOR HEARING THIS SONG LAST 2002 BUT I FEEL HIS SWEETNESS AND FRAGRANCE SO SURE AMEN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

This is like a dream. My 10th yr. anniversary with the Lord is approaching in 09'. I truly am grateful, as I count what I gave up to pursue after Him all dung. Although recently I had become distracted but I thank the Lord, who always draws us back to Himself, for His mercy on us. I fell back and it was hard to admit but praise the Lord for the shinning and for the blood! Lord Jesus, I just offer a fresh consecration to You right now. I love You Lord. We love You Lord. AMEN

It has been a long time when I was saved on July 11, 2001. For these 7 years in the church life I'm so thankful and blessed. I experience the Lord in His all-inclusiveness. 17-year old honeymoon stage with two companions in my college years, a sister and a brother we pursue to gain Christ with the saints, also in Overcomers Club, Campus work Catanduanes State Colleges. I never expected that we can join the Full-Time Training in Malabon. Despite our condition in the family (I have eight brothers and eight sisters in the flesh including me), I remember that we must cut our emotional ties with them. Our friends said to us "Oh what a waste you three." You have already finished your college degree. What are you doing there wasting your time, energy, and lives. For two years in the training: "Oh What a JOY!" It's priceless. May the Lord grant us more Marys in this age who pour out their love offerings. Amen.

Praise the Lord! Like Mary too I want to break my alabaster, so that there is no refills, Lord, make your hope in my heart, I love you Lord Jesus! Saints, pray, go to the meetings, read your Bible, keep your fire burning for the Lord. AMEN!

Wow! This song just shows how much we need to love the Lord. Look at Mary. She is indeed pouring her love to the Lord, sacrificing everything that she has. Not many people can do that. Brothers and sisters, we need to love the Lord like Mary. May God have mercy on us.
The first time i heared this song i was so touched. O, Lord Jesus! I want to take the opportunity to also love You with all that i have.

I really love to sing the song," Mary Poured Out Her Love Offering".It reminds me a lot when I first consecrated myself to the Lord...I am captured by His beauty..Lord Jesus I really,really love You..My dear saints,He is our True love.We must always call on Him...Amen!

Jesus said to share the story of Mary with others when we preach the Gospel..
After seeing how precious the Lord Jesus is to Mary, and how she was so willing to pour everything she had on Him, how can you help but realize the vanity of the world?
This song is such a genuine prayer, and really speaks against the cultural values of this world. What a shame to the enemy.
What a testimony for the Lord..
Wow, we need to see how precious the Lord is! That we would pour our everything on Him! Lord I must confess, my heart is only for Thee!!!
Mary pour out her love offering on the Lord Jesus is not a waste. Positions, golden futures, and her every preciousness is been wasted upon the Lord whom she loved.

All of us should be like Mary, who poured out her love offering to our Lord Jesus Christ. She gave all her best and everything for the Lord.
Like Mary we should pour everything for the Lord, even we have the most precious things, positions and golden futures all of these are vanity because nothing can compare with the preciousness of our Lord Jesus!
"Lord Jesus preserve my first and best love to You, occupy my entire being, Lord You are my everything!"
